title: The Paranormal Pendulum - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/3/20
itunes:title: The Paranormal Pendulum - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/3/20
description:
George Noory and psychic Dan Baldwin explore his using pendulums to answer questions and get insights from the spirits of people who have already passed over to the other side.
